title: Loperamide
summary: Loperamide, sold under the brand name Imodium, among others,[1] is a medication used to decrease the frequency of diarrhea.[2] It is often used for this purpose in inflammatory bowel disease and short bowel syndrome.[2] It is not recommended for those with blood in the stool, mucus in the stool, or fevers.[2] The medication is taken by mouth.[2]
